backend/main.mo: Minimal Motoko canister actor with no methods.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing gameplay changes, related files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend solitaire-related file.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles and OKLCH theme variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Top-level React component applying dark theme and rendering SolitairePage.
frontend/src/features/solitaire/componen: Renders an individual card with face-up/down styling and click/drag behavior.
Button bar providing New Game, Undo, Hint, Scores, and Preferences actions.
Displays move count or disabled message based on tracking setting.
Dialog allowing users to configure timer, move tracking, and confirmation options.
Shows formatted play time or a disabled indicator depending on settings.
Dialog component allowing users to enable or disable timer, move tracking, and ask-again preferences when starting a new game.
Renders a pile of cards with support for empty placeholders, waste/foundation top-card views, selection, hints, and drag-and-drop behavior.
Leaderboard dialog showing best times and least-move playthroughs with scrolling and formatted entries.
Win screen dialog displaying the player's result along with top leaderboard times and move counts.
frontend/src/features/solitaire/hooks/us: React hook providing a resettable, optionally enabled timer with formatted elapsed time.
frontend/src/features/solitaire/preferen: Loads, validates, and saves timer, move tracking, and ask-again preferences using localStorage.
frontend/src/features/solitaire/results/: Manages persistent playthrough results, computes leaderboards, and formats elapsed time.
frontend/src/features/solitaire/solitair: Defines drag-and-drop serialization for card moves, including payload validation and conversion to selection objects.
Computes the next valid move suggestion by checking move priorities across waste, tableau, and foundation piles.
Implements history snapshots for undo functionality, tracking past game states and move counts.
Provides core solitaire mechanics including deck creation, shuffling, dealing, move validation, and stock drawing.
frontend/src/features/solitaire/Solitair: Main Solitaire UI managing game state, dialogs, timer, moves, preferences, and interactions.
frontend/src/features/solitaire/solitair: Defines card, game state, selection, and helper utilities such as rank values and suit colors.
Checks if all foundation piles are complete to determine a win.
frontend/src/features/solitaire/useSolit: React reducer hook managing solitaire state transitions, moves, history, hints, and UI selections.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and refreshes a backend actor based on Internet Identity using react-query.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides authentication context using Internet Identity, including login, logout, and identity restoration.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder file for query-related logic.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining light/dark theme variables and base styling.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Utility function merging Tailwind class names safely.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point initializing React, query client, and identity provider before rendering the app.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with dark mode, extended OKLCH-based color system, container settings, custom animations, and typography/container-query/animate plugins.
project_state.json: Defines the solitaire project's state, including requirements, architectural notes, known issues, and feature metadata for ongoing fixes.
